name: svg-scout
description: Chrome extension to scout and extract SVG icons from any webpage

scripts.build: bun run build:chrome && bun run build:firefox
scripts.build:safari:xcode: bun run build:safari && xcodegen generate --spec safari/project.yml && bun run safari:copy-resources && xcodebuild -project safari/SVGScout.xcodeproj -scheme 'SVG Scout (macOS)' -configuration Debug build
scripts.safari:release: bun run build:safari && xcodegen generate --spec safari/project.yml && bun run safari:copy-resources && xcodebuild -project safari/SVGScout.xcodeproj -scheme 'SVG Scout (macOS)' -configuration Release build
scripts.safari:archive: bun run build:safari && xcodegen generate --spec safari/project.yml && bun run safari:copy-resources && xcodebuild -project safari/SVGScout.xcodeproj -scheme 'SVG Scout (macOS)' -configuration Release -archivePath build/SVGScout.xcarchive archive
scripts.package: bun run package:chrome && bun run package:firefox
scripts.package:chrome: bun run build:chrome && cd dist/chrome && zip -r ../svg-scout-chrome.zip . -x '.DS_Store' -x '*/.DS_Store'
scripts.package:firefox: bun run build:firefox && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../svg-scout-firefox.xpi . -x '.DS_Store' -x '*/.DS_Store' && bun run lint:firefox
scripts.source:firefox: zip -r dist/svg-scout-source.zip manifest.json package.json tsconfig.json vite.config.ts src/ scripts/ public/ README.md -x '*.DS_Store' && echo 'Created dist/svg-scout-source.zip'
